thread.title: Boris Johnson to make his case for Conservative leader
thread.title_full: Boris Johnson to make his case for Conservative leader | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Boris Johnson to make his case for Conservative leader
text:
Boris Johnson and his potential mayoral successor Zac Goldsmith are due to arrive in Manchester this evening at the start of the Conservative conference where they will both make speeches.
This will be Goldsmith's first public appearance since he was adopted as the Tories' candidate for Mayor of London while Johnson is expected to use the platform to present his case as a potential party leader
ITV London Political Correspondent Simon Harris reports from Manchester.
Play video Last updated Sun 4 Oct 2015 Politics london
